HomePage.title: Your open source of Neopets item info.
HomePage.seo-description: Find all the data about Neopets items such as the most updated prices, wearable previews, restock history, color search, capsules drop rates and more! Create your item lists easily and share around Neopia!

Layout.search-by: Search by name or hex color (eg: #fff000)
Layout.error-adding-item-to-list: An error occurred while adding the item to the list, please try again later.
Layout.you-can-change-lang: You can change the language at any time on your profile settings

ItemPage.suggestion-fail: Well that must be a very unique item, because we couldn't find anything like it.
ItemPage.no-trade-history-card: We haven't seen this item at the trading post yet
ItemPage.modalFeedbackCallback: If you feel you have already submitted the correct information with the script and too much time has passed and the correct information is still not live, let us know using the feedback button
ItemPage.modalDoNotCopy: Please do not copy information from other fan sites.
ItemPage.last-seen-works: "Last Seen" works thanks to users using the itemdb's <Link>Item Data Extractor script</Link>
ItemPage.last-seen-works-2: Every time a user with the script stumble across an item, the script will log and send this data to our database.
ItemPage.last-seen-works-3: Rest assured that we do not collect any personal data - you can review our <Privacy>Privacy Policy</Privacy> (and our <Source>Source Code</Source>) for more information.

Lists.this-may-take-a-while-please-wait: This may take a while, please wait
Lists.errorOccurred: An error occurred while adding the items to the list, please try again later.
Lists.dynamic-listModalText: Dynamic Lists are special lists that are automatically updated (once per hour) based on a search query.
Lists.dynamic-listsModalLimit: Dynamic Lists are limited to 4.000 items
Lists.dynamic-listModalChange: You'll not be able to change this or the search query later.
Lists.dynamic-listModalCurrentSearch: All items ({resultCount}) that match the current search query will be added to the list.
Lists.import-error: There were no items to import. Please check your "ignore" fields.
Lists.import-please-wait: Please wait while we {action} your items.
Lists.import-error-action: There was an error {action} your items. Please try again later.
Lists.import-notFound: Could not find {notFound} items in the database. Please visit the How To Contribute to add these items to our database.
Lists.import-this-guide-may-not-work-on-mobile: This guide may not work on mobile devices!
Lists.import-text-1: Install <Link>Tampermonkey</Link> extension for your browser if you don't have it already.
Lists.importer-text-3: Open one of the supported pages:
Lists.import-click-pets-intelligence-number: click on your pet's intelligence number
Lists.import-then-click-the-booktastic-books-r: then click the Booktastic Books read list link
Lists.import-text-3: A new tab will open with a list of items that can be imported. Then you choose your target list and if you want to import, remove or hide the items from that list
Lists.import-text-4: You can also make a <Dynamic>Dynamic Checklist</Dynamic> based on one of our <Official>Official Lists</Official>!
Lists.import-text-5: The script will only send the data of the items you want to import. No data from your neopets account (or the page source code) is sent to our servers.
Lists.import-text-6: Don't trust us? itemdb is open source and you can always take a look at our code!
Lists.import-page-description: Import items and create your checklists easily with itemdb!
Lists.officialList-description: Official lists are especially useful lists for the entire neopia community. They may contain the prize pool of some daily link or event, for example, and deserve to be highlighted!
Lists.officialList-subheader:
Official lists are especially useful lists for the entire neopia community.

They may contain the prize pool of some daily link or event, for example, and deserve to be highlighted!



Anyone can nominate their list to be official! It just needs to be very, very useful!
Lists.official-apply-list-success:
Your list has been submitted.



We will review it and if it's approved, it will receive the official badge and will be available for everyone to use \o/
Lists.official-apply-list-text:
You think your list is cool and useful for the community?



You can apply it to be an official list filling the form below.



If your list is approved, it will be available for everyone to use and you will be listed as list curator!
Lists.official-apply-helper-text: A short summary of what your list is about and why the list is useful
Lists.official-agree-terms: By applying your list, you agree to the <Link>Terms of Service</Link>
Lists.drag-and-drop-to-reorder-lists: Drag and drop to reorder lists
Lists.admin-edit-msg: You are editing another user's list as admin. Be careful.
Lists.seeking-trading-msg: If you are seeking or trading these items, we may show your list to other users who may be interested.
Lists.custom-sort-msg: You can change the order of items in your list by dragging and dropping them.
Lists.delete-lists-confirmation:
Are you sure you want to delete {lists} lists?

This action CANNOT be undone.
Lists.highlights-text: Highlights are only sorted by name
Lists.user-list-tip-1: you can use right click or ctrl+click to select multiple items
Lists.list-want: You want {matchCount} items from this list
Lists.list-have: You have {matchCount} items from this list
Lists.aka-have: aka. items you have that are on this list
Lists.aka-seek: aka. items you seek that are on this list
Lists.move-text: Items that already exist in the destination list will not be modified and the item will be deleted from the current list
Lists.delete-items-confirmation:
Are you sure you want to delete {items} items from {listName}?

This action cannot be undone.
Lists.unpricedItems: There are {0} items without a price
Lists.item-deleted-successfully-you-can-close-: Item deleted successfully. You can close this page now
Lists.change-lang-helper: You'll need to refresh the page to this change to take effect
Lists.color-helper: Leave as #000000 and we will choose one for you based on your cover image

Feedback.modalHelper: If you want to receive a response please enter your email address
Feedback.modalLabel: Write your feedback, comments and ideas
Feedback.modalContributeCallback: Missing items? Outdated prices? <Link>Check this instead</Link>
Feedback.thanks: We appreciate your comments and feedback
Feedback.receivedSuggestion: We have received your suggestion and it will be reviewed by our team.
Feedback.caching: They might take a few minutes to appear due to caching.
Feedback.correctItemInfo: You can correct most of an item's information using the <Link>Item Data Extractor Script</Link>.
Feedback.contribute-description: Itemdb is an open-source website and needs your contribution to become even more awesome. And there are several ways to help!
Feedback.ide-1: All information on itemdb comes directly from users, like you, who are using the <Link>Item Data Extractor script</Link>.
Feedback.ide-2: The Item Data Extractor will collect data from all items you come across during your adventures in Neopia. Whether you're searching for something on the Shop Wizard, browsing through your Safety Deposit Box, or restocking on Half Price Day.
Feedback.ide-3:
No information linking you (or your Neopets account) to the collected data is sent, processed, or stored by our servers.

You and your account are absolutely safe. Don't trust us? The entire code of itemdb is freely available, take a look.

Also, the script code is commented so that you can understand everything that is happening.
Feedback.ide-4: First you will need the <Link>Tampermonkey</Link> extension for your browser if you don't have it already.
Feedback.ide-5: Then you just need to <Link>click here</Link> to install the script and it's done!
Feedback.ide-6: Item info such as name, description, rarity, etc.
Feedback.ide-7: Item prices from shops, auctions, and trades. The owners and bidders usernames are collected, but only the first 3 characters are stored in our database.
Feedback.ide-8: Restock info <Text>When an item is in stock at a shop, the script will collect that information.</Text>
Feedback.ide-9: Openable Drops <Text> When you open items like Mystery Capsules or a Goodie Bags, the script will collect the items you received.</Text>
Feedback.ide-10: Your IP address <Text>This is used to prevent abuse, spam and false information. It's never public available and cannot be used to identify you. </Text>
Feedback.what-is-not-sent-to-itemdb: What is NOT sent to itemdb
Feedback.ide-11: Your username, password, or any other personal information from you or your Neopets account. <Text> Only the first 3 characters of your username may, sometimes, be collected in the situations mentioned above. </Text>
Feedback.fds-1: The Feedback System is a way for you to help us improve itemdb.You can contribute by manually completing missing data or by validating the suggestions of other neopians like you! Either way, the more you contribute correctly the more our systems will trust your information - meaning your suggestions will be live faster.
Feedback.fds-2: You can also help by <Link1>pricing trading lots</Link1> (aka translating the wishlist into Neopoints values) and <Link2>voting on community suggestions</Link2> to ensure they are accurate and correct, and should be incorporated into the itemdb.
Feedback.fds-3: Also, on every item page you can insert additional notes to enrich the information we have available using the Edit button. You can also send comments, report bugs or suggest new features using the Feedback button
Feedback.ol-1: Want to track every prize of a certain event or daily? Or maybe you have a list that could be useful to other neopians? You can apply your list to become an official list on itemdb!
Feedback.ol-2: As an official list, your list will receive a special badge and will be featured on its item's pages, so that other neopians can easily find it. You will be listed as the curator of the list, and it will be your task to keep it up to date and complete!
Feedback.ol-3: Before applying, please make sure your list is complete and up to date. You can also check the <Link1>official lists</Link1> to see other examples of cool official lists! Also check our <Link2>Terms and Conditions</Link2> for more information on official lists.
Feedback.wdf-1: When using the Item Data Extractor Script, the script will automatically collect the all available information from the items on the current page. Each page has a different set of info available. Here is a list of the pages and the info available on each one:
Feedback.feedback-system-description: Most of our content is collected and categorized automatically but there are some things our machines can't do. And you can help it!
Feedback.fds-pg-1: You can contribute by manually completing missing data or by validating the suggestions of other neopians like you!
Feedback.fds-pg-2: Either way, the more you contribute correctly the more our systems will trust your information - meaning your suggestions will be live faster.
Feedback.as-suggesting-you-can-be-asked-to: As suggesting you can be asked to:
Feedback.as-voting-you-can-be-asked-to: As voting you can be asked to:
Feedback.perform-fact-checking-on-the-suggested-i: Perform fact-checking on the suggested information
Feedback.upvote-suggestions: Upvote suggestions with correct and relevant information
Feedback.thanks-for-helping-out-want-more-trades: Thanks for helping out! Want more trades?
Feedback.nothing-happens: If you click the button and nothing happens you really vote for everything... impressive.
Feedback.you-can-also-vote-some-suggestions: You can also vote some suggestions
Feedback.leave-empty-if-price-is-not-specified: Leave empty if price is not specified
Feedback.pt-1: Pricing trade lots is very simple (and therapeutic, some would say), but to ensure that all information is correct we have some do's and don'ts:
Feedback.pt-2: Ground Rule is: if the wishlist leaves doubts about the price, leave it blank.
Feedback.pt-3: Assume prices that are not explicitly described.
Feedback.pt-4: Eg: a lot with junk items and only one 'valuable' item and the owner asks only one price for the whole lot
Feedback.pt-5: However if the 'valuable item' is WAY more valuable than the others you can assume the wishlist is referring to it.
Feedback.pt-6: Divide the lot unique price by the number of items if the items are different
Feedback.pt-7: Eg: 'paperclip trade - 10 items 100np' -> it's not right to assume that each item costs 10NP
Feedback.pt-8: Use other item's price to compose the lot price
Feedback.pt-9: Eg: '6 baby pb + 100k' or '2m + HTS' -> leave it blank
Feedback.pt-10: However if the other item's price is negligible, you can just assume the value in pure
Feedback.pt-12: Eg: 'baby pb for 1np merry christmas' -> leave it blank
Feedback.pt-13: Price only items with explicit price
Feedback.pt-14: Eg: '10m | 5m | nm | 10m' -> leave the 'nm' item blank and precify the others
Feedback.pt-15: However if the 'valuable item' is WAY more valuable than the others you can assume the wishlist is referring to it.
Feedback.pt-17: Divide the lot unique price by the number of items if items are equal
Feedback.pt-18: Round the value to the nearest integer
Feedback.thanks-for-helping-out-want-more: Thanks for helping out! Want more?
Feedback.vote-everything: If you click the button and nothing happens you really vote for everything you could... impressive.
Feedback.you-can-also-price-some-trades: You can also price some trades
Feedback.in-1: Item Notes are used to provide additional information about the item such as it's functions or effects. Please be sure to check the veracity of the information provided before upvoting it :)
Feedback.keyboard-submit: You can hit <Kbd>ENTER</Kbd> in the last price box to submit

Restock.restock-description: Find the most profitable items to buy from each shop in Neopia and earn a lot of neopoints!
Restock.call-to-action: Find the most profitable items to buy from each shop in Neopia!
Restock.dashboard-cta: Checkout the <Link> Restock Dashboard</Link> and track your restock metrics
Restock.half-price-day-all-shops-with-50-off: Half Price Day - All Shops with 50% off
Restock.tyrannian-hub: Tyrannian Victory Day - All Tyrannian Shops with 80% off (except Ugga Shinies)
Restock.faerie-festival-hub: Faerie Festival - Faerieland Shops with 50% off (except Faerie Furniture and Faerie Weapon)
Restock.halloween-hub: Halloween - Haunted Woods Shops with 50% off
Restock.shop-desc: Find the most profitable items to buy from {0} and earn neopoints!
Restock.you-have-no-restock-sessions-for-the-sel: You have no restock sessions for the selected period
Restock.try-another-period-or-import-your-sessio: Try another period or import your sessions
Restock.something-went-wrong-while-loading-your-: Something went wrong while loading your restock sessions
Restock.restock-dashboard-desc: Keep track on your restock metrics, profit, response time, check out the items you missed haggling and more!
Restock.outdated-script: We detected that you don't have the most updated version of the <Link>Restock Tracker Script</Link>.
Restock.text-1: Keep track on your restock metrics, profit, response time, and check out the items you missed haggling
Restock.text-2: You will need a <Link>itemdb account</Link> to sync your restock data with our servers
Restock.text-3: Install <Link>Tampermonkey</Link> extension for your browser if you don't have it already.
Restock.text-5: The script will automatically track your restock sessions and save them in your device.
Restock.text-6: No data will be sent to our servers without your input.
Restock.text-8: Optional but will greatly help us to improve our data. <Link>Learn More</Link>
Restock.text-9: We have a <Link> handful guide </Link> to help you find the most profitable items from each neopian shop
Restock.you-didnt-lose-anything-youre-awesome: You didn't lose anything. You're awesome!
Restock.all-values-are-based-on-current-itemdbs-: All values are based on current itemdb's price
Restock.import-modal-1: You're about to import {x} restock sessions to itemdb. All other unsynced sessions will be discarded.
Restock.import-modal-2: By doing this you're sending your data and it's subject to our Privacy Policy and Terms of Service.
Restock.import-modal-3: You're about to discard all restock sessions saved in your device. You will not be able to import them later.
Restock.import-modal-4: You have a few restock sessions saved in your device.
Restock.import-modal-5: Would you like to import them to itemdb?

DynamicList.addOnly-1: New items that match the search query will be added to the list.
DynamicList.addOnly-2: You'll be able to add new items to the list manually.
DynamicList.addOnly-3: Items that no longer match the search query won't be removed from the list.
DynamicList.addOnly-4: You won't be able to remove items that match the search query - but you can hide them.
DynamicList.removeOnly-1: New items that match the search query won't be added to the list.
DynamicList.removeOnly-2: You'll not be able to add new items to the list manually.
DynamicList.removeOnly-3: Items that no longer match the search query will be removed from the list.
DynamicList.removeOnly-4: You will be able to remove items from the list.
DynamicList.fullSync-1: New items that match the search query will be added to the list.
DynamicList.fullSync-2: You'll not be able to add new items to the list manually.
DynamicList.fullSync-3: Items that no longer match the search query will be removed from the list.
DynamicList.fullSync-4: You'll not be able to remove items from the list - but you can hide them.
DynamicList.linkedLists-desc: Linked Lists are special lists that are automatically updated (once per hour) based on another list.

Login.only-letters-numbers: Only letters, numbers and underlines are allowed
Login.moreInfo: Heey, we need some info to complete your signup
Login.neopetsUsernameReason: We need this info so other users can reach you about NC Trades etc
Login.email-sent: We've sent you an email with a link to sign in. Please check your inbox.
Login.login-modal-text: Use your email to sign in or to create a new account

Profile.allowedDomains: Only images from neopets.com, magnetismotimes.com and itemdb.com.br are allowed
Profile.color-helper: Leave as #000000 and we will choose one for you based on your profile image

FAQ.text-1: Here you can find the most frequent asked questions about the itemdb.
FAQ.text-2: The itemdb is a <Link1> open source </Link1> database for neopets items. It is a community driven project where everyone can <Link2>contribute</Link2>
FAQ.text-3: Our goal is to provide as much information as possible about neopets items and make it easy for you to find new and interesting items whether it be for your pink themed gallery or putting together a cool outfit for your pet.
FAQ.text-4: As a community-supported project, we think it's fair that everyone can use our data for their projects (read our terms first!). Want to calculate neopia inflation in an almost scientifically accurate way? Or sort your gallery by color ? Just take a look at our API .
FAQ.we-have-a-lot-of-cool-features-such-as: We have a lot of cool features, such as:
FAQ.text-5: Create <Link>dynamic lists</Link> that update automatically as new items are released.
FAQ.text-6: See the odds of getting an item from Mystery Capsules, Goodie Bags and other openables.
FAQ.text-7: Search, sort and filter NC Wearables by <Link>Owls Value</Link>. You can also see the Trade Report History for each item.
FAQ.text-8: Use our <Link>operators and filters</Link> to find the perfect item for your gallery or outfit. You can even search for items by color pallete!
FAQ.text-9: Preview how a wearable looks on your pet before buying it. Powered by <Link>Dress to Impress</Link>.
FAQ.text-10: Price your SDB? Sort your gallery by color? We have a lot of <Link>userscripts</Link> to make your life easier.
FAQ.text-11: We have a page dedicated to the different ways you can <Link>contribute to the itemdb</Link>.
FAQ.can-i-talk-about-itemdb-on-neopets: Can i talk about itemdb on Neopets?
FAQ.text-12: itemdb is a <Link>Magnetismo Times</Link> project and, as Certified Site, you should be able to talk about it on Neopets - but you cannot link to it. Just make sure you also mention Magnetismo Times to be safe around Neopets' moderators
FAQ.you-have-a-lot-of-missing-or-wrong-info: You have a lot of missing or wrong info...
FAQ.text-13: All the information on the itemdb is provided by users like you using our <Link>Item Data Extractor Script</Link>. Most of the time, as soon the correct information hits our database, it will be automatically updated on the site and you should not worry about it.
FAQ.text-14: But sometimes, when TNT changes something, our algorithm will fall into a merge conflict and we will need to give it a check manually. If that is the case, you can help us by reporting the issue using the Feedback Button on each item's pages.

Error.404-text-1: The page you are looking for does not exist :(
Error.404-text-2: If you think it should exist, please use the button below to let us know.
Error.404-text-3: We think <Link>this page</Link> might be appropriate instead...
Error.500-text-1: This error has been reported and our meepits will be working on it as soon as possible.

Temp.yahoo-mail-error: Yahoo users may experience difficulties receiving emails at the moment
